reviewText: This would be the DVD for you.

Well-done video with great in-flight views and details of this great plane. Even though I've been privileged to fly on 3 B-25's (as volunteer crew or simply passenger), I still found this video very interesting. If you haven't been lucky enough to fly on one, this may help to offset your disappointment (slthough nothing beats the real thing!).
I thought this was going to show me what my dad saw or experienced as a WWII navigator - but it was mostly just film of the pilot.  Disappointing.
